attributes.action: The Government in Nepal should have more stringent training for airplane pilots
attributes.additional_details:
Only 4 months since the last, and another plane has crashed in Nepal, killing all 19 people on board.

Just over 2 years ago, my friend Jeremy died in a very similar plane crash going to Everest.

The death toll of plane crashes in Nepal has hit 95 in the last 2 years (2010- Present); which reads as an alarmingly high rate.

Hopefully with this petition, we can start putting pressure on the government in Nepal to re-train their pilots to a better standard and put an end to these horrific atrocities that are affecting people across the globe.
